event.title: "I Love Free Software Day 2025" organised by FSFE Sicilia, Italy

body.p: With I Love Free Software Day around the corner the Italian local FSFE group is taking up the challenge to organise a lovely I Love Free Software Day celebration in Sicilia. Everybody is welcome to join us in celebrating our love for Free Software and in reaching out to all Free Software contributors to acknowledge their work for Free Software.

p.strong: Where: Via Leone XIII 48/d, 93100, Caltanissetta (CL), Sicilia

body.p: We look forward to seeing many of you on the 11th of February for our pre-celebrations ♥ ♥ ♥ !
